Description: Pottery ostracon; two fragments re-joined. The text contains a Schutzbrief/asylum written in Coptic.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Henri Édouard Naville (1893-94, on behalf of EEF)
Bibliographic references: Till 1964 / Die koptischen Rechtsurkunden aus Theben (p.48)
Till 1938 / Koptische Schutzbriefe. Mit einem rechtsgeschichtlichen Beitrag von Herbert Libesny (p.99)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (390748) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/390748)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Crum 107 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
Miscellaneous number: O.Schutzbriefe 50 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
